SEARCH
Package bookstoreinventorymanagementsystem

Class EmailHandler

java.lang.Object
bookstoreinventorymanagementsystem.EmailHandler
public class EmailHandler extends Object
This class handles the functionality related to sending emails for various purposes within the app, such as registration verification emails and password reset emails, using Google Mail's SMTP server.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EmailHandler()
    Constructs an EmailHandler object with a null verification code.

  • Method Details

    • getVerificationCode

      public String getVerificationCode()
      Retrieves the generated verification code.
      Returns:
      the verification code.

    • sendRegistrationVerificationEmail

      public void sendRegistrationVerificationEmail(String toEmail) throws javax.mail.MessagingException, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Sends a registration verification email. The email contains a verification code that the recipient needs to use to verify their email address to complete the sign up process.
      Parameters:
      toEmail - the recipient's email address to which the verification email will be sent.
      Throws:
      javax.mail.MessagingException - if an error occurs while sending the mail.
      UnsupportedEncodingException - if the encoding is not supported.

    • sendResetPasswordEmail

      public void sendResetPasswordEmail(String toEmail) throws javax.mail.MessagingException, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Sends a password reset email to the specified email address. The email contains a verification code that the user needs to use to verify their identity before they can reset their password.
      Parameters:
      toEmail - the recipient's email address to which the password reset email will be sent.
      Throws:
      javax.mail.MessagingException - if an error occurs while sending the email.
      UnsupportedEncodingException - if the encoding is not supported.
